text:
Polly | Software Engineers | Seattle| FULL-TIME (Onsite) https://www.polly.ai

Polly is a venture backed startup (with investors like Slack, SV Angel, Amplify Partners and others) that is taking a consumer like approach to enterprise surveys. We deliver our solution exclusively in messaging (Slack) and currently support thousands of companies. We’re a small team (9 employees) with great traction in an emerging space, so there’s the opportunity to come in and have tremendous impact on the product, the culture, the company, and the space itself. Our stack is Node, Typescript, Meteor, AWS.

Our roles:

  * Mid/Senior Full Stack Developer
  * Mid Front-end engineer, with the ability to go full-stack if necessary (HTML, CSS, JS/Node)
  * Product Manager with technical background
Comp/Benefits:

  * Competitive salary + equity
  * Medical, dental, vision for you and your dependents
  * PTO
  * Paid parental leave
  * Laptop and budget to customize your setup
Send an email to me at samird@polly.ai and reference HN.
